subject: Order #SSN4445 info about refund after wrong sent model
description_text:
Hi and happy new year,

I sent this after no progress with an issue. I ordered pro x ultra and got a plus x model. After informing you , you proposed a refund of the price difference and to keep the sent plus x. I have accepted the solution but there is no news. Latest email sent was at the 26th of December. I await for a reply.

Thank you,
Nikos

conversations.body_text: Hi nikos ni,  Our Germany warehouse can ship to EU countries. You can also leave a note on your order requesting shipment from Germany.

Thank you for reply, I however cannot see an option to leave a note at
order checkout, do I send a message after the order is placed to ensure no
VAT, tac?


------------------------------
*

Hi nikos ni,     I apologize for not responding to you promptly. You may proceed with placing your order directly. You can add any notes here.  https://www.simsonn.com/products/simsonn-racing-sim-pedal-pro-x-ultra

Hi nikos ni,    We sincerely apologise for any inconvenience caused. The item is currently out of stock at our German warehouse, but we have arranged an urgent shipment via UPS for you. It is expected to arrive on the 22nd. Should any customs duties arise, we will reimburse you for these, so please rest assured.

Hi,

Thank you for the very thorough reply, it eased my mind, which is appreciated! Well, there goes hope it passes with minimal charges or, who knows, none at all. I'll  keep track and notify for any news.

Thanks again, nikos


________________________________

Hi,

I send to report, that while I received my order, and quite fast might I say (also no issue with customs), i must regretfully share I received a different product than the one I ordered. my order number is SSN4445 and instead of a pro x ult, I received a plus x model. Ideally I would prefer to get the product i did order. I attach pictures of received product and await for further instructions, thank you.

Regards,
Nikos


________________________________

Hi nikos ni,    We apologize for the inconvenience caused. We can refund the extra charges for you. Actually, the Plus X model offers the best value for money. Would you be willing to accept this solution?  Merry Christmas!

Hi,

Oh well anyhow, yes refund me the price difference I'm entitled to, please. Also, may i ask for further discount for future purchases ? It should be fair play , how that sound?
I'll wait for further info if need be.

Have a Merry Christmas you too!


________________________________
